price: Sag: Gewiß, mein Gebet und mein (Schlacht)opfer, mein Leben und mein Sterben gehören Allah, dem Herrn der Weltenbewohner.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحۡيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: qul inna ṣalātī wanusukī wamaḥyāya wamamātī lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
